assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Gallantt Metal Limited produces and sells iron, steel, and power in India and internationally. The company operates through Iron and Steel; and Power segments. It offers sponge iron, mild steel billets, and re-rolled products. Gallantt Metal Limited was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Gorakhpur, India.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Prashant  Jalan
companyOfficers.title: Director of Plant Operations & Whole-Time Director
